name: Feng Shui Ghost Friendship
description:
If ghosts were real, and they haunted people, and they were really into feng shui. Then just maybe this game could be real. But since that isn't the case we made this lovely little experience for you in the 2019 Global Game Jam.

Credits:

James Picone

Arlen Drechsler-Savage

Simon Milne

Keirron Stach
